TopicTitle: After a long day at the station..

Articles.Content:
Hi.. new to the space race...

Starting my race to Mun and in testing my Mun-Module (inverted).. I wanted to make sure that the decoupler worked on the nose cone.. with somewhat humourous results

A hard day at the office ends like this .. then it's time to go home ...

https://www.dropbox.com/s/ulvaludqe4xyfd5/KSP_Humour.mp4?dl=0
